item.title: OpenAI lawyers question Meta’s role in Elon Musk’s $97B takeover bid
item.description: OpenAI says that Elon Musk met with Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to discuss a $97 billion takeover bid of the ChatGPT-maker.

item.title: Anduril, Blue Origin to study how to transport cargo from orbit to Earth for the Pentagon
item.description: Blue Origin and Anduril notched small contracts that could revolutionize how the Pentagon transports cargo.

item.title: As India bans real-money games, Dream Sports, MPL start pulling the plug
item.description: Several Indian startups, including Dream Sports, MPL, and Zupee, are shutting down their real-money games after parliament passed a bill banning such ...

item.title: Ecosia has offered to take ‘stewardship’ of Chrome. And it’s not a bad idea.
item.description: Berlin-based nonprofit search engine Ecosia has asked a U.S. judge to turn Chrome into a foundation it controls, funding billions in climate projects.

item.title: Gas power plants approved for Meta’s $10B data center, and not everyone is happy
item.description: Meta's massive data center will draw power from three gas-fired power plants producing 2.25 gigawatts.
